title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, Appendices, app 51
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, Appendices, app 51

State Regulations

Lead-Bearing Materials that may be Processed in Exempt Lead

Smelters

Appendix XI to 40 CFR part
266, as of July 1, 2002, is
incorporated by reference as if fully set forth herein (see section
370.1
[e]
of this

Title). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, Appendices, app
51

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
